mapper.select: select * from tcc_admin where admin_id = #{admin_id} and admin_pw = #{admin_pw}
select ceil(count(board_conidx)/10) pages from tcc_board where board_config=#{board_config}
select board_idx, board_conidx, board_name, board_regdate from tcc_board where board_config=#{board_config} order by board_conidx desc limit #{snum}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into tcc_board (board_config, board_conidx, board_name, board_contents, board_attachName, board_attachPath, mem_idx) values (#{board_config}, #{board_conidx}, #{board_name}, #{board_contents}, #{board_attachName}, #{board_attachPath}, 1)
mapper.select: select max(board_conidx) from tcc_board where board_config=#{board_config}
mapper.update: update tcc_board set board_name = #{board_name}, board_contents = #{board_contents}, board_attachName = #{board_attachName}, board_attachPath = #{board_attachPath} where board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.select: select * from tcc_qna order by qna_idx desc limit #{snum}, 10
mapper.update: update tcc_qna set qna_answer = #{qna_answer} where qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tcc_qna where qna_idx >= (select qna_idx FROM tcc_qna where qna_idx = #{qna_idx})
